titles.title: A bill to establish a Counterterrorism Advisory Board, and for other purposes.
Counterterrorism Advisory Board Act of 2019
Counterterrorism Advisory Board Act of 2019
Counterterrorism Advisory Board Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Johnson with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 116-59.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 158.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
